articles.title: Matteo Berrettini Retains Queen's Club Trophy - ATP Tour
articles.description: Matteo Berrettini successfully retained his Cinch Championships title on Sunday, overcoming Filip Krajinovic 7-5, 6-4 to capture his seventh tour-level trophy and fourth on grass.
articles.content:
